author: Jason Lemon
title: Dr. Fauci Says Easing Lockdown Measures Too Soon Will Lead to 'Big Spike' in Coronavirus Cases: 'It's Gonna Backfire'
description: "Unless we get the virus under control, the real recovery economically is not gonna happen," Dr. Anthony Fauci said.
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, a key member of the White House Coronavirus Task Force, has warned that reopening the economy too quickly by easing lockdown restrictions could lead to a "big spike" in new coronavirus cases.
Fauci, who serves as the director of the Nation… [+4225 chars]
